examples.input:
Find a movie similar to Spider-Man, Spider-Man 2, The Matrix, Independence Day:
Options:
(A) Jurassic World Fallen Kingdom
(B) The Fifth Element
(C) Across the Universe
(D) Insomnia

Find a movie similar to American Beauty, Austin Powers International Man of Mystery, Star Wars Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back, Mission Impossible:
Options:
(A) Dragon Ball The Curse Of The Blood Rubies
(B) Moonlight Mile
(C) Hollywood Homicide
(D) Star Wars Episode IV - A New Hope

Find a movie similar to Men in Black, The Fugitive, Raiders of the Lost Ark, Fargo:
Options:
(A) The Silence of the Lambs
(B) College
(C) Music Box
(D) Get Smart

Find a movie similar to Braveheart, Get Shorty, The Shawshank Redemption, Pulp Fiction:
Options:
(A) The Fugitive
(B) Ready to Rumble
(C) Thoroughly Modern Millie
(D) Ninja Shadow of a Tear

Find a movie similar to Braveheart, Pulp Fiction, Schindler's List, The Usual Suspects:
Options:
(A) Kazaam
(B) Eichmann
(C) Children of the Night
(D) Apollo 13
